storyInfo: Midnight receives a message from Higashi. Galvanized by his teammates, he finds the courage to listen to it in its entirety.

attributes.content: 11:18 P.M. \ Overcast
Rhodes Island Landship, Operator Dorms
If you don't hurry up already, Midnight, I'm going by myself.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Give me just another minute. I'm almost done. If you have to burn the midnight oil, wouldn't you rather share the time with the finest Midnight?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I'd rather get a new partner.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Hey, your terminal's ringing.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Looks like Orchid is too eager to see me. Mind taking it for me?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Hell no. My hands are full of comics.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Well, then, prepare yourself for the majestic sight of my soaking wet body. Aren't you delighted you get to enjoy it for free?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Midnight, this is a private voice message for you. Transfer complete. The message will begin automatically in three seconds—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Messenger

attributes.content: Yoru-kun... did you get the letter I sent you? I... We don't know where you are right now, but it's been more than six months...
attributes.name: Exhausted Female Voice

attributes.content: They said they found a way to contact you, so I thought I would give it another try. I only hope it reaches you in time...
attributes.name: Exhausted Female Voice

attributes.content: Ever since I sent my last letter, your father's health has worsened, day by day. Now it's hard for him to even get out of bed...
attributes.name: Exhausted Female Voice

attributes.content: He... He's been staring out at the garden a lot. I think he might be waiting for a Messenger to come... He keeps telling me not to contact you, but I think it might be his last wish...
attributes.name: Exhausted Female Voice

attributes.content: Please, Yoru-kun, could you...
attributes.name: Exhausted Female Voice

attributes.content: ...*cough*, *cough*.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: You're getting all your hair water on my comic.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I let my hair air-dry once in a while. It really brings out my charm.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: You sure about that?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Of course. I know how to take care of looks.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: What I'm saying is, you sure you don't want to hear the rest of the message?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I don't understand a lick of Higashinese, but still...
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I thought you were waiting for me to head out? I couldn't bear to take another minute, as soon as I realized I was keeping my beloved partner waiting outside in the cold.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: That's not what you said just now when you took your shower.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Whatever, we have a long night ahead of us and we aren't getting out of it. If you're ready, then let's get going.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I thought you would be on the road by now.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Who do you think slowed us down?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Good evening, Orchid. It may be late, but your makeup is perfect as always. Even the moonlight out the window looks all the more alluring, much thanks to you.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: You haven't forgotten what I told you last time, have you?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I'll be deducting any time you spend talking nonsense instead of working from your overtime pay. In other words, if you want to see your paycheck for tonight's mission, you'd better stop talking now.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh, Orchid, why so serious? The only thing that has ever been on my mind is helping lift the weight off your shoulders. Money means nothing to me.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Have you read the mission briefing?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: There's a young man missing nearby. Our job's to find him.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: You, Midnight?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Understood. We're chasing a young man lost in the shades of evening.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Worry not, Orchid. No one escapes my charm. With me on the job, I am sure he too will...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: His parents suspect he was kidnapped by local gangsters.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: If it's a kidnapping case on our hands, that's easy.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Remember not to make a ruckus. I already have enough reports to take care of.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: If the boy's parents didn't have dealings with Rhodes Island, this wouldn't have been our mess at all.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Very well, my dear leader. We need only keep a low profile, right?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Although my aura can hardly be shrouded by any environment or circumstance, I accept this challenge. I am not one to give you a tough time.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: As long as you get the gist. Now go. Be quick about it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Right, Midnight—
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I saw a Messenger just now with an urgent message for you from Higashi. Did you get it?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: If you have something more urgent, I can ask Catapult to take the mission.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh, Orchid, how moving. You are as considerate as a saint, and your thoughts alone are enough to move me to tears...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Get to the point. Do you need Catapult to take this or not?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: ...But I am not planning to let some trivial matters from back home affect our important work.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Good. Stay in contact, then.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Ugh, you sure you're fine?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: My, even you are concerned about me tonight. Looks like my sincere smile has finally melted your hearts!
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Yeah, sure. I'm just disappointed. I almost got a different partner.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Jeremy? Is that you? What are you doing here? Didn't you say you wouldn't be coming back for the foresee—
attributes.name: Young Citizen A

attributes.content: Oh lovely lady, don't move. Please.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: W-Who are you people?
attributes.name: Young Citizen A

attributes.content: We are looking for the 'Jeremy' you speak of.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I... I don't know where he is. I already told the cops as much this afternoon...
attributes.name: Young Citizen A

attributes.content: We are no mere police.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: What?! Then... Who are you?
attributes.name: Young Citizen A

attributes.content: My lady, your friend was kidnapped by a few menacing-looking gangsters. That's what you told his parents, am I correct?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Erm... yes.
attributes.name: Young Citizen A

attributes.content: In that case, please take a look at the Reproba man off to the side behind you.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Have you noticed his gaze? Does he seem fearsome to you?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: D-Dear God! No way, you don't mean... you are...
attributes.name: Young Citizen A

attributes.content: Shh.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: That's right. We are exactly who you think we are.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Those in our line of work will always own up to what we have done, but I'm afraid if someone tries to pin on us something we haven't done—
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Jeremy is at the Iron Mine pub down on the corner of 18th Street!!!
attributes.name: Young Citizen A

attributes.content: I... I told you everything... I should never have lied for him... Please, I'm so sorry. Please don't hurt me... *sobs*...
attributes.name: Young Citizen A

attributes.content: And that's settled.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: The target's hanging at the pub unharmed. No one kidnapped him; he ran away from home. Aren't you absolutely stunned? I have a fine pair of eyes that never fails to see right through a girl.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: And what was that hand signal or whatever? Were you trying to tell me to get ready to fight?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Look at you. How am I to do harm to a lovely lady like her? You need only to leave these matters to me and my fabulous acting.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: And here I thought it was my weapon that did the trick.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Oh, my darling partner. After my countless demonstrations, how do you still fail to understand?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: More often than not, words are more effective than violence.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: One more pint? No. One pint isn't enough. Give me a dozen!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Now that I've got all that weight off my shoulders, I'm drinking till I drop!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Stinking old man. He keeps making me study... What does he know?!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: I wanna make music. I'll be the hottest musician in this pub, and I'll have concerts all the way over in Siesta!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: (Claps)
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Who... Who are you?
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Hey, we're looking for...
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: We're searching for the most eurythmic sound there is.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Perhaps you'll grant me, a connoisseur of music, the chance to buy a drink for the man who will become the hottest musician to ever visit this pub?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Ha, hahaha...! Hell yeah! You've got a good eye!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Often am I told I have a particularly fine eye for beauty, but the truth is that my ears are equally sharp.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Dear musician, care to tell me what your instrument of choice is?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I... I can play everything! Especially... guitar!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: My, my. Is this your guitar? Look at its exciting colors and contours. It reminds me of a fine lady.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I gotta hand it to you, everything you say is like music to my ears...
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Thank you for the compliment. Everyone has a talent, and it so happens mine lies in conversation.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: To our talents!
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: To... To talents!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Well, then, young musician. Would you mind giving us a taste of the music you take such pride in?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: O-Of course! Here... Here I go!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: (Plays the guitar)
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: How... How's that? Sounds awesome, right?
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: My... your music truly leaves an impression.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: (Now that's a master BSer at work.)
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Please, continue.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: (You sure? I need to put a little more distance between me and that.)
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Hah... Haha! Need an encore? Try this on for size! I-I wrote this piece just two days ago!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: (Plays the guitar)
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Okay, what the fricking shit is this? Boss, this crap's terrible!
attributes.name: Customer A

attributes.content: Yeah, if you're gonna keep torturing our ears, we're outta here!
attributes.name: Customer B

attributes.content: Hey...! What are you saying?!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: My music's brilliant... What do you know? How dare you talk smack about my art!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: You're the one ruining our drinks with all that noise, and you're complaining? Buzz off, kid. Go back to your room and do your homework!
attributes.name: Customer A

attributes.content: Is my music bad?
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Hm... would you like to hear the truth?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Please...
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: My musician friend, I'm afraid you don't have much talent for music.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: No... That's not true!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Please calm down. Even without talent, a man has the right to chase his dreams.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: And as long as you persist down this path...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Enough!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: If I don't have talent, then this is all meaningless... Music... guitar... Screw it all!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: This is a beauty of a guitar. You should be more gentle with her.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: (Strums a few chords)
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: How'd you...
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Hey, that's a good one! Now that's more like it!
attributes.name: Customer A

attributes.content: Oh, new guy playing, huh? Boss, you hear this? If you're doing live music, this is the guy you should hire!
attributes.name: Customer B

attributes.content: You flatter me, but I am not a musician. I merely tried my hand at guitar for a few months to entertain my customers and help them relax.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: What... Come on, man, you're just here to ruin my day, aren't you?
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Now that's not quite right, my young musician friend.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: You're the one who tried to ruin your beloved instrument, not me.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I could hand you your guitar back, but have you really put thought to how you will hold it?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: There is a price to pay for fulfilling your dreams. And it costs not only sweat, but money as well... Are you sure you've made the proper preparations?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Money... Right... I don't have money!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: But I'll have money real soon! I hooked up with that gang already, and I'll be raking in lots of dough if I spend the next couple days away from home—
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: What was that for... *cough*... How dare you throw wine in my face!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Apologies, my hand slipped.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Your hand slipped...?
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Perhaps that cleared your head a little?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: There are many ways one can use a fine wine, and this is the most wasteful way there is.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: However, if you keep telling me you plan to work with the gangs, I don't mind wasting a few more glasses with you, until you have a perfectly clear head.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: S-Stop it already!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: It's just making my old man cough up some money! You're the one who told me to prepare some money. Why are you against this?
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: My musician friend, you never needed my support. Not anyone else's either, for that matter.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Perhaps you'll find yourself a few coins richer by doing this, but that is not what I mean by 'preparation.'
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Otherwise, tell me this: have you ever wondered how your parents feel about this turn of events?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: How they feel...? I bet they're overjoyed now that they finally got rid of me!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Or perhaps... they are crying their eyes out, worried for your safety?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: No way... No way in hell.
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: You don't believe me, or perhaps you can't bring yourself to believe me?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: If you haven't thought it through, how are you so sure you can bear the consequences for you and your parents?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: What consequences... I have no idea?
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Just who are you anyway?
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Apologies for not introducing myself sooner. I am an operator from Rhodes Island, and this sullen-looking Reproba gentleman is my partner.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Rhodes Island?! That's the company that sends my mother medicine...
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Are you... Are you here to look for me? Did my mother...
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: If my eyes do not deceive me, it seems you are worried about your mother?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: No... definitely not!
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: It's not so bad to look back every now and then, before you set out on a journey chasing your dreams.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: If you want to go home and check on your family, my partner and I will be waiting for you at the door.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Young Citizen B

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Mission complete—Judging from your expression, you find yourself once again stunned by my beautiful performance.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I'm just wondering... what do we do if the prick doesn't show? I don't wanna waste my strength knocking him out.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: He will be here.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Back already? I was expecting you to take longer.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Our speed is thanks to my brilliant performing. Now if I fail to get five hours of sleep, my handsomeness will take a hit tomorrow.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I read the brief you filed on your way back. So the boy actually ran away from home?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Orchid, my love, please do not hesitate to compliment the accuracy of my predictions.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Sounds like you got all the compliments taken care of yourself...
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: That boy... He has the gall to work with the gangs to swindle his parents' money. Money they need for his mother's life! And they almost handed it right to them.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Maybe we should've let the cops arrest him. That'd show him what a big mistake he made.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Worry not, Orchid. Before real tragedy could unfold, the boy who wandered astray managed to find his way back to the right path.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: You sure he won't act out again?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: My team leader, could you give me a little more credit?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: It's not often I agree with this guy.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: The kid was crying his eyes out in his arms. Even got my fur dirty.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Is this another one of the Devil of the Eastern Night's 'special powers?'
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: He stood outside their front door and told the kid everything he went through, and that's how the kid turned out. Decided he was some kind of mentor. Almost didn't let him go.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: What he went through?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Midnight, you still haven't told us about you and your parents.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: My love, I never expected you to show such a keen interest in me...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I really wish I could say I'm not showing any interest in you whatsoever, but...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Just this once, I'll listen to whatever you have to say. No, not just me. Spot too—
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: You dragging me into this?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Normally, you would have already snuck out of the room.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Alright, fine. Lay it on us, Midnight.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I am moved, and I suppose it's only proper if I give you two a hug? Orchid, it's a shame you aren't here in person. I have only Spot to bring into my embrace—
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Just tell the story already and keep your hands to yourself. We're never doing this again.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Well... You already heard much of the story just now.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: You mean that thing about your old man beating you to a pulp out in the snow with a family heirloom sword? Where you still made the decision to leave home and chase your dreams, and you made it to the top of your industry after lots of hardships and obstacles?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Only the getting beaten part was new. The rest I've heard so many times, my ear fur almost froze over.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: What happened after that isn't nearly as spectacular... On the contrary, it's incredibly boring.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: After I found my footing, I started sending some money back home every month. My mother wrote me every so often, but my father...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Knowing him, he would never forgive me. I didn't want to stoke his ire any more, so we haven't had any contact at all.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Did you ever tell them you left Higashi, and about your disease?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Orchid, my love. You've worked away from your family all these years, but you haven't told your parents about all your worries at work, have you?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: This is Oripathy we're talking about... My worries don't compare at all.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Right, it's a tad bit more worrying.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: In Higashi, I left behind most of my savings and arranged someone to send them money every month. It was more than enough for them to live out their remaining years in comfort.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: If you were even half as amazing as you're saying you were, you wouldn't need to work for your treatment money.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Money can be earned again. Besides, my greatest asset is me myself.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: But it's like you said... Do you think your parents care more about you or money? If your family still writes to you, isn't that more than enough to show that they don't just want money?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Even I have questions I can't answer, Orchid.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Honestly, it's not up to us to worry about what your parents think about.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I think both Spot and I are more worried about how you feel yourself.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: If I have to have a question... I suppose it's a very simple one.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: If someone hasn't been home for nearly two decades, is there really a need for him to go back?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: What? Are you scared?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Scared? I'm the Devil of the Eastern Night.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Perhaps there are a few problems that I'm not very willing to face.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Are you afraid to go home? Do you maybe regret the decision you made all those years ago?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: What is there to regret when I have lived such a splendid life, free of control?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: So you're worried they still don't accept you?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: When I was in my teens, I suppose I merely wanted the approval of those dearest to me, just like the young man we met today.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: But I got over that long ago.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: You're starting to lose me.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I suppose... my real fear is...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Never mind. No matter what I do now, it might already be too late.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Look at me rambling on and on. The sun is about to rise. Why not hit the pub for another round?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Am I allowed to say no?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I would wager you don't actually want to say no.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Fine. That's a bet you'd win, for once.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: But let me make one thing clear. If you end up drinking too much, I'm not carrying you back to the dorm.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Oh, so heartless now? This pains me.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Know what, I'll pass...
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Don't say I didn't warn you. You shouldn't drink too much before you go on a long trip.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Uhh... Did I ever say I was going on a long trip?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: In your own words? It's not so bad to look back every now and then.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Look back, huh...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Your terminal's still on. Looks like that message is starting to play again...
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I'll see you tomorrow, my dear partner.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Hey, I told you already. I don't understand a lick of Higashinese!
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Also, if you're going to take a break, don't forget to tell Orchid. I don't want to get any of your work.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Voice message.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.text: Yoru-kun, your father made it this long because he wants to see you again.
He would never say anything, but I know. He wants to tell you the same thing I do.
We just want to tell you...

attributes.content: Sorry...?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Haha... What was I so afraid of...?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: If you've apologized, then... I have no reason to avoid going home?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: A ticket to Higashi...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Well, I suppose I'll write back before I buy it.
attributes.name: Midnight
